Header.description: ISANG BUKAS NA RANGGONG, PALIGSAHAN SA OSU! LAZER

Descriptions.mappool: A lazer modpool featuring new mods each week.
Descriptions.format: Isang bukas na ranggo, dobleng eliminasyon, 3v3 na paligsahan.
Descriptions.schedule: Watch upcoming matches being streamed on Twitch.

Originals.title: Mga orihinal
Originals.subtitle: CUSTOM SONGS COMING SOON.
Originals.description: Advance through the stages to unlock exclusive TEST Originals. Talented creators crafted custom tracks that progressively reveal at qualifiers, semifinals, finals, and grand finals. With each original featuring unique style and art, these beatmaps are reserved for the tournament's top competitors.

SponsorSpot.sponsoredBy: TEST OPEN is proudly sponsored by
SponsorSpot.sponsorMessage: CUSTOM TABLET COVERS AT A FAIR PRICE

Footer.description: ISANG BUKAS NA RANGGONG, PALIGSAHAN SA OSU! LAZER NA HOSTED NI TEDDY, ENTROPY, AT SORA.

Metadata.description: Osu!'s first large scale open rank lazer tournament. Welcome to the new osu! tournament experience.

ErrorPage.title: Something went wrong!
ErrorPage.message: Sorry, but it seems like something broke on our end. You can try clicking try again, and if that does not work then you can click go back home.

Team.heading: CURRENT TEAM
Team.none: You currently do not have a team. Join one by accepting any pending invites.

Invites.heading: PENDING INVITES
Invites.none: You currently do not have any invites. Wait for one or create your own team.

ExistingTeam.title: ALREADY ON A TEAM!
ExistingTeam.message: Looks like you are already on a team. Please delete or leave your current team before joining a new one.

FailedInvite.title: FAILED TO {type} INVITE!
FailedInvite.message: Sorry, we failed to {type} that invite. Please try again to see if that helps.

CurrentTeam.title: KASALUKUYANG NASA ISANG PANGKAT!
CurrentTeam.message: Mukhang ikaw ay kasali pa sa isang pangkat. Maaring umalis o tanggalin ang pangkat bago tanggalin ang iyong account.

FailedAccountDelete.title: NABIGO ANG PAG TANGGAL NG ACCOUNT!
FailedAccountDelete.message: Sorry, looks like we failed to delete your account. Please try again to see if that helps.

FailedUpdate.title: FAILED TO UPDATE!
FailedUpdate.message: Sorry, we failed to update your osu profile info. Please try again to see if that helps.

DeleteAccount.title: DELETE ACCOUNT?
DeleteAccount.message: Are you sure you would like to delete your account? This will delete any data stored and revoke all your active access tokens for osu! and Discord.

Closed.title: SARADO ANG PAG REHISTRO!
Closed.message: Sarado ang pag rehistro hanggang magsimula ang paligsahan. Maaring bumalik pag natapos na ang countdown sa unang pahina.

Success.title: NAGAWA NA ANG PANGKAT!

InvitedSelf.title: BAWAL I-IMBITA ANG SARILI!
InvitedSelf.message: Bawal mo imbitahin ang sarili mo sa iyong pangkat. Kung gusto mo lumipat ng pangkat tanggalin muna ang iyong pangkat.

AlreadyInvited.title: NAIMBITA NA ANG MANLALARO!
AlreadyInvited.message: Mukhang naimbita mo na ang manlalarong ito. Maaring tanggalin ang kasalukuyang imbitasyon bago ito gawin ulit.

InviteFailed.title: NABIGO ANG IMBITASYON!
InviteFailed.message: Paumanhin, nabigo ang pag imbita sa manlalaro. Maaring subukan muli kung ito ay makakatulong.

PlayersOnTeam.title: MAY MGA MANLALARO PA SA PANGKAT!
PlayersOnTeam.message: Maaring alisin muna ang mga manlalaro sa pangkat bago ito tanggalin.

DeleteTeamFailed.title: NABIGO ANG PAGTANGGAL NG PANGKAT!
DeleteTeamFailed.message: Paumanhin, nabigo ang pag tanggal ng iyong pangkat. Maaring subukan muli kung ito ay makakatulong.

PlayerOnTeam.title: ANG MANLALARO AY NASA PANGKAT NA!
PlayerOnTeam.message: Mukhang ang manlalaro na ito ay nasa pangkat mo na. Kung ito ay isang pagkakamali maaring subukan muli kung ito ay makakatulong.

NotOnTeam.title: WALA PA SA PANGKAT!
NotOnTeam.message: Mukhang wala ka pa sa isang pangkat. Maaring pumunta sa iyong propayl at tumanggap muna ng imbitasyon.

GeneralInfo.1: Ang TEST Open ay isang paligsahan sa osu! na eksklusibo sa kliyenteng **[osu! Lazer](https://osu.ppy.sh/wiki/en/Help_centre/Upgrading_to_lazer)**.
GeneralInfo.2: Ang mga pangkat ay nilalaman ng **3-5 na miyembro**.
GeneralInfo.3: Ang mga pangkat ay kailang pumili ng **3 manlalaro** sa kada isang map na nilalaro sa paligsahan.
GeneralInfo.4: **Walang pangangailangan sa ranggo** para sa mga kasali.
GeneralInfo.5: Lahat ng inaasahang pangkat ay kailangang sumailalim sa qualifiers sa nakalistang katapusan ng linggo.
GeneralInfo.6: Ang pinakamataas na **32 pangkat** sa qualifiers ay magpapatuloy sa saklungang **Double Elimination**.
GeneralInfo.7: Lahat ng manlalaro ay kailan sumali sa **[Discord Server](https://discord.com/invite/nZnQZMvEhq)** at itakda ang kanilang palayaw sa kanilang **osu! username**.
GeneralInfo.8: Ang mga oras ay nakalista sa **UTC-0** at **Discord Local Time**.
GeneralInfo.9: Ang mga miyembro ng tauhan na may tungkulin maliban sa sumusunod ay bawal lumahok sa paligsahan: {sublist_alpha} Streaming {sublist_alpha} Commentary {sublist_alpha} Design {sublist_alpha} Translation
GeneralInfo.heading: PANGKALAHATANG IMPORMASYON.

Schedule.1: **Rehistrasyon:** ika-26 ng Pebrero - ika-18 ng Martsa
Schedule.2: **pagtatabing:** ika-18 ng Martso - ika-23 ng Martso
Schedule.3: **Qualifiers:** ika-29 ng Martso - ika-31 ng Martso
Schedule.heading: ISKEDYUL

Registrations.1: Kailangan mag-sign up sa website gamit ang parehong **osu!** at **Discord account**.
Registrations.2: Ang paggawa ng pangkat at pamamahala ay maaring gawin sa **[TEST Open Website](https://test-open.com)**.
Registrations.3: Para gumawa ng **libreng ahente post**, pumunta sa **discord server** at hanapin ang looking-for-team channel. At doon ay maari kang mag-post gamit ang **TEST Bot**.
Registrations.4: Kung hindi gumagana ang website ikaw ay maaring magtanong sa admin ng **registration form**. Gayunpaman, pag ito ang ginamit mo makikita ang iyong impormasyon sa sheet ngunit hindi sa website hanggang ito ay sadyang baguhin.
Registrations.5: Ang mga tauhan ay hindi gagawa ng **pangkatang libreng ahente**. Kaya kung gusto mong sumali, kailangan mong maghanap ng pangkat.
Registrations.heading: REHISTRASYON.

GeneralConduct.1: Respetuhin ang ibang manglalaro at lahat ng mga tauhan.
GeneralConduct.2: Walang **mga terminong may diskriminasyon**. Kasama ngunit hindi limitado sa: {sublist_alpha} Racial Slurs {sublist_alpha} Mga tuntunin na maaaring nakakasakit sa LGBTQ+ members {sublist_alpha} Sexist comments {sublist_alpha} Mapoot na Pagsasalita
GeneralConduct.3: Ang TEST Open ay walang toleransiya sa kahit anong uri ng bullying.
GeneralConduct.4: Ang **may kabastusang nilalaman** ay bawal. Kasama rito ang: {sublist_alpha} Kahubaran {sublist_alpha} Gore/May marahas na nilalaman {sublist_alpha} Pag abuso sa Droga/Alak {sublist_alpha} Nakakabahalang nilalaman
GeneralConduct.5: Subukang panatilihin sa pinakamababa ang **kontrobersyal na paguusap**.
GeneralConduct.6: Siguraduhing sibilisado ang mga hindi pagkakasundo.
GeneralConduct.7: **Doxing is not allowed** under any circumstances.
GeneralConduct.8: No content that is banned under **Discord TOS** is allowed.
GeneralConduct.9: **English is the primary language of the tournament**, so keep this in mind when communicating with staff.
GeneralConduct.10: If you see somebody breaking any of these rules, please contact a **Moderator or Admin** to get it resolved.
GeneralConduct.11: Lastly, just use **common sense** and create a **welcoming environment** for everyone!
GeneralConduct.heading: GENERAL CONDUCT.

Scheduling.1: Matches will be scheduled through the **TEST Bot** in the Discord Server.
Scheduling.2: For scheduling or rescheduling a qualifier lobby, please use the **/schedule** command and enter the prompted information.
Scheduling.3: For rescheduling a match, please use the **/reschedule** command and enter the prompted information. This will send a reschedule request in the scheduling channel.
Scheduling.4: When rescheduling a match **both team captains will have to click accept** on the reschedule request in the scheduling channel in order for the reschedule to complete.
Scheduling.heading: SCHEDULING.

GameProcedures.1: All maps will be scored with **osu! Lazer default scoring**.
GameProcedures.3: Referees will contact the Captains of any participating team for each game. {sublist_alpha} Captains are responsible for relaying any information given by the referee to their team. {sublist_alpha} A reminder will be sent out **25 minutes** before each game. {sublist_alpha} Lazer room name and password will be sent out **15 minutes** before each game.
GameProcedures.4: After a map has been selected, participating players have **2 minutes** to join the lobby.
GameProcedures.heading: GAME PROCEDURES.

Qualifiers.1: Maps will be played in the same order as seen on the mappool.
Qualifiers.2: If a player **disconnects** **within the first minute of a map**, the player will replay the map at the **end of the qualifier room**.
Qualifiers.3: Teams are expected to have 3 players in the room within **5 minutes after their room start time**. If a team fails to show up then the team will have to reschedule their room. This room must be at least **4 hours** after the room they failed to show up to.
Qualifiers.heading: QUALIFIERS

Match.1: The win-condition for each match will be **TeamVS**.
Match.2: Warmups, Protects, Bans, and Picks must be submitted within **2 minutes**.
Match.3: Teams are expected to have 3 players in the room within **5 minutes after their match start time**. They will forfeit the following at each timestamp. {sublist_alpha} 5 minutes late is forfeit of protects. {sublist_alpha} 10 minutes late is forfeit of bans. {sublist_alpha} 15 minutes late is a forfeit of match.
Match.4: Players must be in a lobby slot corresponding to their team. {sublist_alpha} Team 1 (Red): Slots 1, 2, and 3. {sublist_alpha} Team 2 (Blue): Slots 4, 5, and 6.
Match.5: Captains will use the **/roll command in the Discord thread** of their match to decide **Pick/Ban order**. The captain with the higher roll may select one of the following, while the other captain will receive the other: {sublist_alpha} First to Pick and Second to Ban {sublist_alpha} Second to Pick and First to Ban
Match.6: Teams may opt into playing 1 map of their choice as a warmup before the match. {sublist_alpha} Warmups must be **less than 4 minutes long**. {sublist_alpha} Warmups may **not be part of the mappool**.
Match.7: Protects will be **privately submitted** to the referee before the banning phase.
Match.8: Banning phase will be done in a **snake format** (ABBA). {sublist_alpha} Team 1 Bans {sublist_alpha} Team 2 Bans twice {sublist_alpha} Team 1 Bans
Match.9: Once the ban and protect phase has ended, **any bans on a protected map will be voided** and that map will be playable as normal.
Match.10: Banning from the **same modpool twice in a row is prohibited** excluding the **No-Mod pool**.
Match.11: Picking from the **same modpool twice in a row is prohibited** excluding the **Lazer-Mod** and **No-Mod pools**.
Match.12: Players may play Tiebreaker with any mod that is **not a global rate change mod**.
Match.13: Each team has **one 5-minute timeout** which may be used at any point in the match.
Match.14: If a player **disconnects within the first minute of a map**, the map will be **aborted** and the team has **5 minutes** to field another player to play the map. This may only occur once per team and per match.
Match.heading: MATCH

MappoolInfo.1: The mappool will be released the **Sunday** of every week.
MappoolInfo.2: Lazer Mod, or LM for short, is a modpool that will feature different mods every week to showcase the new mods the Lazer client has to offer.
MappoolInfo.heading: MAPPOOL INFO.

PrizePool.1: Ang MVP ng paligsahan {sublist_alpha} **Customized WLmouse Beast X mini mouse** na dinisenyo ni Spoo at pininturahan ng Dovacustoms. Ang pasadyang mouse ay masasamahan ng pangalan ng manlalaro na nakapintura sa taas.
PrizePool.2: Unang Pwesto {sublist_alpha} pinag hati hating $500 sa mga manlalaro {sublist_alpha} **Customized TEST Open Tablet Cover** na dinisenyo ni Spoo at ginawa ni Bluebunny {sublist_alpha} Animated na Banner ng Koponan
PrizePool.3: Pangalawang Pwesto {sublist_alpha} pinag hati hating $200 sa mga manlalaro {sublist_alpha} Static na Banner ng Koponan
PrizePool.4: Pangatlong Pwesto {sublist_alpha} pinag hati hating $100 sa mga manlalaro {sublist_alpha} Static na Banner ng Koponan
PrizePool.heading: PRIZE POOL.

ComingSoon.title: MALAPIT NA!
ComingSoon.message: Ginagawa palang ang pahina na ito. Maging alerto sa impormasyon tungkol dito, at tingnan muli pag ito ay handa na.

Errors.missingCode: Paumanhin, pero ang pag-sign in ay hindi makumpleto. Pag hindi inasahan subukang muli kung hindi ay huwag mag-atubiling mag-navigate pabalik sa home.
